definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base

sentences.english: Objective To examine the pulmonary tuberculosis mortality risk of the residents in high background radiation area (HBRA), Yangjiang, China.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨天然放射性高本底地区居民肺结核死亡危险。

sentences.english: Objective To study the diversity and distribution of medically important insect vectors in the northern area of Guangdong.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解粤北地区的医学媒介生物本底情况。

sentences.english: The method of detecting the low-energy scattering, neutron background was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了扣除低能散射中子本底的方法。

sentences.english: These levels of naturaland background radiation is normal.
sentences.chinese: 这种程度的自然本底射线是很常见的。

sentences.english: Possibly we are accustomed, biologically speaking, to this background radiation.
sentences.chinese: 从生物机理上说，我们可能已经习惯了这种本底辐射。

sentences.english: But natural background radiation is more than 100, 000 times the highest levels detected.
sentences.chinese: 但其检测量大大高于自然本底辐射量一万倍。

sentences.english: And less background gas is incorporated in the deposited film .
sentences.chinese: 而只有较少的本底气体引进于射薄膜中。

definition: land use plan (official P.R.C. government term)
